Module: main/prettyPrint

Given a nested or flat directory tree, along with a key, it will return a formatted string listing the contents of that directory tree, with one item per line.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
data array an array of objects. Ideally will be a directory tree or a flattened directory tree
indent integer the number of spaces to indent each line of the output string by. Defaults to 0
key string which key from a file/directory object to print. Defaults to 'name'. Other possible value is 'path'.
recurse boolean If true, contents of a sub directory will be pretty printed as well, with an indentation of 3 more than the current indentation
